description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              The company:
              
              Learning is the noblest, most impactful activity a person goes through. It has the potential to change lives, save lives, make people grow, become more capable, achieve more, contribute more and generally be happier. Add technology to the mix and you get that in a massive, world-changing scale. That is what we do.
              

              GO1 is growing to be the most used source of professional learning in the world and we need more highly capable and passionate people to help take us there. We are a Y-Combinator startup in rapid growth stage with offices in Brisbane, Sydney, Melbourne, San Francisco, Ho Chi Minh City and Kuala Lumpur. We have a strong company culture that rewards initiative, love for learning and passion in your field. Work with very smart people and have access to all levels of the company while making the world a better place.
              

              Position Responsibilities:
              
              - Manage and perform all Human Resources range of activities in the GO1 Vietnam office, including:
              
              - Recruitment, onboarding and offboarding.
              
              - Learning and development
              
              - Performance reviews and structured feedback
              
              - Employee relations
              
              - Company policies, procedures and guidelines
              
              - Work health and safety compliance
              
              - Compliance to local labour law and employment best practices
              
              - Support local payroll team with remuneration guidance and other information.
              
              - Assist world-wide People and Culture team in global P&C/HR initiatives and activities.
              
              - Manage all organisational culture, values and team building activities in the Vietnam office.
              
              - Improve alignment to the GO1 Values within the GO1 Vietnam office.
              
              - Perform any ad-hoc activities and duties, as requested by management, to make our Vietnam and international operations succeed.
              
              - Nurture a positive work environment.
              
              - Live, breathe and champion the company values and culture.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Mô Tả Công Việc
requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              - Excellent English (fluent written and spoken) - you possibly have lived, worked or studied in an English speaking country for a considerable amount of time.
              
              - Excellent Communication skills (listening, explanatory, negotiation)
              
              - Excellent Interviewing Skills (unbiased behavioural and situational interviewing)
              
              - Excellent skills in observation and understanding people's values, attitudes and behaviour.
              
              - Strong computer and technical skills (very important)
              
              - Demonstrated thirst for continuous learning and self-development
              
              - Positive mindset and attitude
              
              - Ability to work under pressure and work in a fast-changing, startup environment
              
              - Completed bachelor's degree in Human Resources, Psychology, Business, Marketing or a field that covers understanding human behaviour.
              
              - Min 2 years experience in human resources or related area.
              
              - Ideally, you have experience in the startup or technology space.
              
              - High alignment to the GO1 Values:
              
              + Strong internal drive to provide excellent work and an excellent user experience
              
              + Bias for action
              
              + Demonstrates creativity and candor
              
              + Simply loves learning
              
              + Respects all things great and small
              
              + Can work and be part of 1 single team across the entire company (collaboration, teamwork)
              


              Why you will love working here:
              
              - Purpose - we enable learning and professional development in our clients and users. The better you and your colleagues work, the more positive value we create in the world.
              
              - Open & Fun - an amazing internal culture where your colleagues are open, receptive and have fun.
              
              - High Standards - work with very smart colleagues and in a company that operates at the top tech world standards
              
              - Great work space – enjoy free coffee, snacks and regular BBQs on site.
              
              - We are passionate about Learning - enjoy unlimited access to the GO1 Learning platform - over 1000 training modules are waiting for you!
              
              - We’re in serious growth – GO1 is on a stable and rapid-growth curve and you’ll have the opportunity to grow with us
              
              - Shape the future - with growth comes the opportunity to learn and implement best practices, try new things, and shape the company with your ideas.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
